author: martin
msg: Make FreeBSD (which does not have sendfile.h) compile again. This typo
because a #define did not resolve to 0 or 1, but to an empty string.

author: jim
msg: Cleaner re-implementation of what we actually use AC_CHECK_HEADERS
for... For one, we never use the multi-header capability. So
APR_CHECK_HEADER makes a bit more sense. We also set the flag

author: rbb
msg: Line things up to make them easier to read

author: rbb
msg: Fix the sendfile handling in APR.  We have to subst the sys_sendfileh

author: trawick
msg: Get the various Unix flavors (other than Linux) building again
by finishing up the APR_HAVE_SYS_SENDFILE_H symbol.
